description:
18.31 sidedata, asidedata
Delete frame side data, or select frames based on it.

This filter accepts the following options:
name: asidedata

options.description:
Set mode of operation of the filter.

Can be one of the following:

‘select’

Select every frame with side data of type.

‘delete’

Delete side data of type. If type is not set, delete all side data in the frame.
options.name: mode

options.description: Set side data type used with all modes. Must be set for select mode. For the list of frame side data types, refer to the AVFrameSideDataType enum in libavutil/frame.h. For example, to choose AV_FRAME_DATA_PANSCAN side data, you must specify PANSCAN.
options.name: type
